Evoo EVC141-12 Laptop Specs:

Windows 10 Home
14.1” FHD Display, 1920 x 1080, 60Hz
AMD Ryzen™ 5 3500U Mobile Processor with Radeon™ Vega 8 Graphics
(2.1GHz, Up to 3.7GHz)
256GB Solid State Drive
8GB Memory (RAM)
HD Front Camera
Up to 10 hours of battery life
Bluetooth 4.2
HDMI Port x 1
USB 2.0 x 1
USB 3.1 x 2
USB Type-C x 1 (Data Transfer Only)
Kensington Lock x 1
Ethernet Port x 1
